zh-cn: 小崔西·拉玛尔·麦葛瑞迪

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，司职得分后卫及小前锋，2017年入选奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂。
description.en: American former professional basketball player who played as a shooting guard and small forward, inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国佛罗里达州的城市，是特雷西·麦克格雷迪的出生地。
description.en: A city in Florida, United States, and the birthplace of Tracy McGrady.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国佛罗里达州奥本代尔的一所高中，特雷西·麦克格雷迪曾在此就读。
description.en: A high school in Auburndale, Florida, United States, where Tracy McGrady attended.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国北卡罗来纳州达拉谟的一所高中，特雷西·麦克格雷迪曾在此就读。
description.en: A high school in Durham, North Carolina, United States, where Tracy McGrady attended.

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，是特雷西·麦克格雷迪的偶像。
description.en: American former professional basketball player, who was Tracy McGrady's idol.

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，被广泛认为是历史上最伟大的篮球运动员。
description.en: American former professional basketball player, widely regarded as the greatest basketball player of all time.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国伊利诺伊州芝加哥的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in Chicago, Illinois, United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，以其在芝加哥公牛队的职业生涯而闻名。
description.en: American former professional basketball player, best known for his career with the Chicago Bulls.

description.zh-cn: 位于加拿大多伦多的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in Toronto, Canada.

description.zh-cn: 美国前职业篮球运动员，是特雷西·麦克格雷迪的远房表亲和前队友。
description.en: American former professional basketball player, who is a distant cousin and former teammate of Tracy McGrady.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国佛罗里达州奥兰多的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in Orlando, Florida, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国得克萨斯州休斯敦的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in Houston, Texas, United States.

description.zh-cn: 中国前职业篮球运动员，曾与特雷西·麦克格雷迪在休斯敦火箭队组成“姚麦组合”。
description.en: Chinese former professional basketball player who formed the 'Yao-Mac' duo with Tracy McGrady on the Houston Rockets.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国纽约州纽约市的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in New York City, New York, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国密歇根州底特律的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in Detroit, Michigan, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国佐治亚州亚特兰大的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in Atlanta, Georgia, United States.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国山东省青岛市的CBA职业篮球队。
description.en: A CBA professional basketball team based in Qingdao, Shandong, China.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国得克萨斯州圣安东尼奥的NBA职业篮球队。
description.en: An NBA professional basketball team based in San Antonio, Texas, United States.

nodes.id: 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂

zh-cn: 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂
en: Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame

description.zh-cn: 纪念为篮球运动作出卓越贡献的人物和团队的名人堂。
description.en: A hall of fame that honors individuals and teams who have made outstanding contributions to the sport of basketball.

description.zh-cn: 特雷西·麦克格雷迪在奥本代尔高中度过了他高中生涯的前两年。
description.en: Tracy McGrady spent the first two years of his high school career at Auburndale High School.

description.zh-cn: 特雷西·麦克格雷迪转学至蒙特锡安山基督学院完成其高中学业。
description.en: Tracy McGrady transferred to Mount Zion Christian Academy to complete his high school education.

description.zh-cn: 自1993年起，特雷西·麦克格雷迪视安芬尼·哈达威为偶像，并开始效仿他在比赛中的一招一式。
description.en: Since 1993, Tracy McGrady has idolized Anfernee Hardaway and began to emulate his moves in games.

description.zh-cn: 在1997年NBA选秀期间，迈克尔·乔丹以退役为威胁，阻止了芝加哥公牛队交易斯科蒂·皮蓬以换取选秀权来选中特雷西·麦克格雷迪的计划。
description.en: During the 1997 NBA draft, Michael Jordan threatened to retire, preventing the Chicago Bulls from trading Scottie Pippen for a draft pick to select Tracy McGrady.

description.zh-cn: 1997年，特雷西·麦克格雷迪在NBA选秀中被多伦多猛龙队以第九顺位选中，效力至2000年。
description.en: In 1997, Tracy McGrady was selected by the Toronto Raptors with the ninth pick in the NBA draft and played for the team until 2000.

description.zh-cn: 2000年夏天，特雷西·麦克格雷迪加盟奥兰多魔术队，效力至2004年6月29日被交易。
description.en: In the summer of 2000, Tracy McGrady joined the Orlando Magic and played for them until he was traded on June 29, 2004.

description.zh-cn: 2004年6月29日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪被交易至休斯敦火箭队，效力至2010年2月19日。
description.en: On June 29, 2004, Tracy McGrady was traded to the Houston Rockets, where he played until February 19, 2010.

description.zh-cn: 2010年2月19日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪在一笔三方交易中被交易至纽约尼克斯队。
description.en: On February 19, 2010, Tracy McGrady was traded to the New York Knicks in a three-team deal.

description.zh-cn: 2010年8月10日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪以自由球员身份签约底特律活塞队。
description.en: On August 10, 2010, Tracy McGrady signed with the Detroit Pistons as a free agent.

description.zh-cn: 2011年12月8日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪以自由球员身份签约亚特兰大老鹰队。
description.en: On December 8, 2011, Tracy McGrady signed with the Atlanta Hawks as a free agent.

description.zh-cn: 2012年10月10日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪宣布加盟中国篮球职业联赛球队青岛双星。
description.en: On October 10, 2012, Tracy McGrady announced he was joining the Chinese Basketball Association team Qingdao DoubleStar.

description.zh-cn: 2013年4月16日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪与圣安东尼奥马刺队签约，并随队征战至赛季结束，随后于8月26日宣布从NBA退役。
description.en: On April 16, 2013, Tracy McGrady signed with the San Antonio Spurs and played with the team until the end of the season, subsequently announcing his retirement from the NBA on August 26.

relationships.target: 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂

description.zh-cn: 2017年9月9日，特雷西·麦克格雷迪正式入选奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂。
description.en: On September 9, 2017, Tracy McGrady was officially inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.

description.zh-cn: 特雷西·麦克格雷迪是文斯·卡特的远房表亲，两人曾在多伦多猛龙队做过队友。
description.en: Tracy McGrady is a distant cousin of Vince Carter, and they were teammates on the Toronto Raptors.

description.zh-cn: 特雷西·麦克格雷迪与姚明在休斯敦火箭队作为队友，组成了著名的“姚麦组合”。
description.en: Tracy McGrady and Yao Ming were teammates on the Houston Rockets, forming the famous 'Yao-Mac' duo.
